name: SmartGridToolbox
body:
### Introduction
SmartGridToolbox is a C++-11 library API for developing smart grid and microgrid simulations. It was developed by the [Energy Systems](http://org.nicta.com.au/portfolio/energy-systems/) subgroup of [Nicta](http://www.nicta.com.au)'s [Optimisation Research Group](http://org.nicta.com.au), with the help of the [Australian National University](http://www.anu.edu.au) and [Actew-AGL](http://www.actewagl.com.au).

SmartGridToolbox's simulation engine uses agent-based and discrete event simulation concepts. Research into future electricity grids requires the ability to handle a wide range of control strategies and simulation components.SmartGridToolbox aims to provide this ability through an API that emphasises flexibility and extensibility.
